name: CPM All in one Poll
author: codepixelzmedia, vishalbasnet23, utsavsinghrathour

sections.description:
CPM All in One Poll lets you create polls in 7 different chart types, is fully translatable. It supports Widgets and Shortcode. Supports multiple polls in a single page and you can also simply show the results of the poll.

** Free

  1. Progress Bar
  2. Pie

Single poll in a page.
Shortcode and Widgets

** Premium

  1. Bar
  2. Pie
  3. Polar
  4. Doughnut
  5. Progress Bar
  6. Line
  7. Radar

Supports multiple polls in a page.
WPML ready
Shortcode and Widgets

Premium version comes with a year worth of premium Support. Buy Premium for just $19

Avail 20% off on Premium Poll Plugin. Use Promo Code “20POLL” on checkout.
sections.installation:
Installing CPM All in One Poll is easy:

  1. Upload plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Start creating Polls and use them using the shortcode provided on Polls post type.

short_description: CPM All in One Poll is an awesome plugin that lets you create Polls with 7 different chart types, and is fully translatable.
